56. $\cfrac{(x^2-9)(y-x+1)}{x-3}=0\Leftrightarrow\begin{cases} \left[\begin{array}{l}x=3,\\ x=-3,\\ y=x-1.\end{array}\right.\\ x\neq3.\end{cases}$
$$% TIKZ_ID{task056-solution-fig1}
